content: As of June 30, 2022, we have reduced Radian Guaranty's PMIERs minimum required asset requirements by $1.1 billion by distributing risk through both insurance-linked notes reinsurance and other third-party reinsurance arrangements as noted on press release Exhibit K. Consistent with our use of risk distribution strategies to effectively manage capital and proactively mitigate risk, in July 2022, Radian Guaranty agreed to terms on a quota share reinsurance arrangement with a panel of highly rated third-party reinsurance providers.
